description: The museum field is broad and inherently interdisciplinary, incorporating a range of topics including artistic, cultural, ethical, financial and legal questions. Students explore these issues and learn about the practicalities of a range of museum departments and jobs, including collections management and care, curation, development, and education. The class will work with objects in the Flaten Museum collection.
name: Top: Museum Studies

revisions.description: The museum field is broad and inherently interdisciplinary, incorporating a range of topics including artistic, cultural, ethical, financial and legal questions. In this seminar course, students will explore these issues and more in addition to learning about the practicalities of a range of museum departments and jobs (including collections management and care, curation,development, and education). Students will also work with the Flaten Museum's collection.

title: Topics in Art History
